[SYNTAX]: Overly complex sentence structures in artistic descriptions (e.g., "He had founded his art...").
[TRANSITION]: Minor awkwardness between historical and artistic paragraphs due to abrupt topic shifts.

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transitions between unrelated historical/artistic topics (e.g., Becket → Boucher → Canterbury Roman history).
[LOGIC]: Lack of explicit thematic connection between pilgrimage theme and artistic/historical tangents.

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt topic shift from Bahá’í context to Saxon history without transitional link
